name: Publishers, Writers and Readers Conference (PaWaR)
content: Publishers, Writers and Readers Conference is a first of its kind to be held in Birmingham UK. The conference aims to bring publishers, writers and readers together under one massive roof to network, build connections, to promote each other's work and to break barriers because Together we can make it happen. There will be workshops, presentations and a chance for manuscripts to be reviewed by professionals. Join us for this dynamic conference.
